meanings.definition: A device that converts organic or fossil fuel-based materials into combustible gas.
meanings.sent1: The gasifier turned wood chips into fuel for the stove.
meanings.sent2: The factory installed a new gasifier to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: The gasifier at the recycling plant had a great sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a gasifier, sparking new ideas in everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The gasifier roared to life, transforming waste into energy with a fiery passion.

meanings.sent1: The inventor was a skilled gasifier, always finding ways to create energy.

meanings.sent4: Her determination was a gasifier, fueling her success in every endeavor.
meanings.sent5: The young scientist was a natural gasifier, constantly experimenting and innovating.
